Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I was able to get instant feedback rather than trying to get feedback once a week in class or during a consultation class which is it an inconvenient time for me to attend.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from a teacher is more trustworthy as they should know the course best and how to answer questions, but it is more of an effort to ask a teacher rather than AI.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is instant whereas there is a delay when asking a teacher.
